description:
Ape Escape is a platform game published and developed by Sony for the PlayStation, released in 1999.
The story revolves around the main protagonist, Spike, who has to prevent history from being changed
by an army of monkeys led by Specter, the main antagonist.

0.20.description:
First release since 0.10

Thanks to @jeffreybardon, @Exempt-Medic for helping with this release with some issues/fixes
Thanks for chocobo13 (Discord) for providing useful RAM addresses and help to find some of them

## What is this fixing or adding?
- Fixes:
  - All Monkeys and coins are now sending, checked all of them 1 by 1 to make sure
  - Disconnecting/Reconnecting now works to reset coin tracking
  - Rom validation now works instead of returning "True" every time
  - Corrected old references for options in code to use a more supported approach
  - Gladiator Attack now requires you to have Flyer : If you get in the level without having it unlocked you will have no gadgets available
  - Logic update and fixes
  - Spacing, parenthesis and syntax fixes in code
  - Loading a game/savestates while connected would break coin detection
- Features : 
  - Implemented the code to track and send Junk Items. 
  No sound or visual effects are triggered for now, only adding the values directly*
  - Slot Data now sends to AP for tracking purposes
  - Implemented logic for Super Flyer trick
  - (Option) Super Flyer can be excluded from No IF and IJ logic if needed
  - (Option) Starting Gadget You can now replace the club with another starting gadget or remove it, in addition to having the Net
## How was this tested?
Multiples generations and client live changes.
Fixes have been tested many times since they were early and features where added since then
For Starting gadget IHNN tested with multiples generations and live tests.
For Junk Items, I tested multiples scenarios (New Game, Load Game, Switching Rooms and loading savestates) and did an extensive test run

**RAW Changelog and notes**: [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/b22a9503132cb57044de0b6e07e1207f9823f031/worlds/apeescape/LOCAL_CHANGELOG)

v0.3.0.description:
## Version 0.3.0

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago

**Added/Changed:**
- Base Setup and Documentation
- Client is now preventing you from being kicked out of levels by catching all monkeys.
- Better Junk:
  - 4 new fillers : 25 Energy Chips,5 Cookies, 3 Explosive Pellets, 3 Guided Pellets
  - Special Pellets capped at 9 maximum, like vanilla
(We may have Capacity Upgrades for each special pellets in the future)
  - Weights have been added to fillers to help adjust the number depending of the filler item and some of them had their category changed to "Useful"
- Monkeys send instantly when catching instead of when changing room
- Crumbling Castle Boss and TV Tower Boss are now included as locations
- Specter 1 and 2 now send their check when dealing last hit to the boss
- Item Groups/Locations Groups
  - Item Groups
    - Gadgets : All gadgets
  - Location Groups :
    - One for each level, which contains all coins/monkeys from a given level (Ex.: Primordial Ooze)
    - Races :  Stadium Attack and Gladiator Attack
    - Monkeys : All Monkeys
    - Coins : All Coins
    - Bosses : Both Specters, Crumbling Castle Boss and TV Tower Boss
    
**Fixes**
- Fixed entering next world early by capturing all of the last unlocked world last level monkeys (Ex.: Catching all monkeys in 1-3,would get give you access to 2-1 with no keys at all)
- Fixed Specter 2 not sending correctly to AP (Was bugged since instant monkey sending)
- Fixed that having all gadgets unlocked would instead leave you with no gadgets at all
- Fixed coins detection being out of sync/broken when reloading a game
- Fixed unlocking condition for Peak Point Matrix
- Fixed Magic Punch visual glitch in menu

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/0.20...v0.3.0
v0.3.0.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.3.0

v0.4.0.description:
## Version 0.4.0

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago

**Added/Changed:**
- You now spawn in Time Station when you start a New Game
- Option ``superflyer`` : Choose if the Super Flyer trick should be put into logic
  - Glitchess : Always disabled (Ignores YAML value)
  - No_IJ and IJ : Disabled by default
- Option ``mailbox`` : Choose if Mailboxes should be added as checks
  - Disabled by default
  - Adds 62 locations in total
  - Red Mailboxes open when you get close and Blue Mailboxes requires you to hit them
- Option ``shufflenet`` : Choose if you should shuffle the Time Net into the pool
  - Disabled by default
  - Special cases to avoid generation failures : 
    - Options ``shufflenet: true`` + ``coin: true`` +``mailbox: false``
    The Time Station mailboxes will still be checks to help the AP fill.
    - Options ``shufflenet: true`` + ``coin: false`` + ``mailbox: false``
    A warning will be issued and Time Net will be given to you, since your only possible locations all requires Time Net



- Removed ``.apae`` file generation since it was not needed and caused confusion (Still have the code, but commented it)

**Fixes**
- Fixed TVT Boss giving the check early if you entered/exited the room

**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" if you want the ``shufflenet`` option in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0
v0.4.0.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.4.0

v0.5.0.description:
## Version 0.5.0

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago

**Added/Changed:**
- Option ``shufflewaternet`` : Choose if you should shuffle the Water Net into the pool
  - Disabled by default
  - Replace "Water Net" item with 2 new items:
    - Progressive Water Net : First stage gives you Swim ability, Second stage gives you Dive ability
    - Water Catch : Gives you the ability to water catch
    - If you cannot Swim yet, you got about 3 seconds to exit water or else you die

**Fixed:**
- Dexter's Island Mailbox were mismatched
- Coin Logic for Cryptic Relics corrected

**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" if you want the ``shufflewaternet`` option in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0
v0.5.0.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.5.0

v0.6.0.description:
## Version 0.6.0

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago

**Added/Changed:**
- Option Entrance : Choose which level entrances should be randomized. Peak Point Matrix will always be the last level.
- Option Keys : Choose how many levels each World Key should unlock. The first three levels will always start unlocked

**Fixes:**
- Corrected a bug with some other games that would prevent the seed from generating
- Fixed Specter 2 access rule to include water net
- Some access rules correction for some coins
- Fixed Level Scrolling being janky when scrolling past Dimension X maps
- Changed Water detection for Water Net Shuffle to be a bit better

**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.3.2](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.3.2)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0
v0.6.0.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.6.0

v0.6.1.description:
## Version 0.6.1

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago

**Added/Changed:**
- Finally locked the "Training Room Gadget Trainings" : They are not part of the randomization and should not be entered
- Changed the behavior on Kickout Prevention mechanic so it locks it without affecting required monkeys amount
- Added missing WSW "Big Cogwheel" mailbox
- Changed some Options order in the YAML for better clarity
- Added Entrances connections to the spoiler
- Some names, typos and code optimization 
- Changed Swim prevention behavior for Water Net Shuffle: 
  - No Progressive Water Net : (Oxygen is at 3 seconds worth). When you touch water it depletes your oxygen until you get on solid ground
  - Progressive Water Net # 1 : (Oxygen is at 3 seconds worth).You can swim on the surface with no problem. You cannot dive manually, but if you go underwater the oxygen starts to depletes. It goes back to 3 seconds worth when you get back to the surface.
  - Progressive Water Net # 2: (Full Oxygen Bar) You get all vanilla capabilities of Water Net (Including Dive) 

**Fixes:**
- Fixed level list sorting bug that caused PPM to be in the shuffle list
- Fixed Obelisk Inside mailbox detection
- Fixed some Water Net logic/client detection
- Fixed Super Flyer Logic for CC Puddles
- Fixed Cryptic Relics coin logic (**Again**)
- Fixed Crumbling Castle Charles logic

**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.4.4](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.4.4)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1
v0.6.1.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.6.1

v0.6.4.description:
## Version 0.6.4

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago

**Options:**
- Change to coin display behavior in Level Select : Now all the coins are hidden, this is made so that when entrances are shuffled the player will not be confused about coin completion
- Death link implementation : Now you can activate an option in your YAML that links your deaths to your friends ! Classic AP functionality but still fun !
- New Low Oxygen Sounds option (off, half, on)
  - off : No Low Oxygen Sounds will play in water. Watch your oxygen meter closely ;) ...
  - half: Will cut in half the Low Oxygen Sounds when in water.
  - on: Default behavior, no changes from the vanilla game
- New options to the Shuffle Water Net (off, progressive ,on)
  - off : Water Net will not be shuffled and given to you at the start
  - progressive :  Water Net is split into Progressive Water Net + Water Catch and shuffled into the pool
  - on : Water Net as a whole is shuffled into the pool.

**Fixes:**
- Fixed DeathLink in Main menu triggering once after going into "New Game" or "Load Game"
- Minor Reorder of options to be in a more clear state
- Fixed an instance where if you have no Progressive Net the Oxygen Replenish triggers wrongly
- Fixed a bug where Surface detection would not be correct and/or sometimes crash the game when having no Progressive Water Net and receiving it after
- Fixed a bug where the Punch Visual fix failed to apply sometimes. It should now detect if the bytes are correct and replace it if it's not

**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.4.4](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.4.4)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.6.1...v0.6.4
v0.6.4.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.6.4

v0.6.5.description:
## Version 0.6.5

Would not normally make a release but there is a major bug, so here it is

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago

**Fixes:**
- For debug purposes : Bizhawk client now show the apworld version when the handler connects to the emulator
- Fixed : Entering Time Trials caused the game to crash .
- Fixed : Having Punch and entering ANY level that normally send you to a Gadget training will send you to Punch training instead. If the Training is completed, the game would then crash.
- Just in case, applied a small fix to the Kickout Prevention code to ensure it only runs when in a Level

**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.4.4](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.4.4)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.6.4...v0.6.5
v0.6.5.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.6.5

v0.7.0c.description:
## Version 0.7.0c

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago

**Hotfixes for version 0.7.0.c**
- Fixed : A type conversion bug in the Punch replacement code caused the client to disconnect and not sending/receiving things

**New content/changes**
- [New Option] Lamps : Can shuffle Monkey Lamps into the pool, which locks the 8 Monkey Lamps behind Items instead of the requirements to catch Monkeys with the Net.
- Low Oxygen Sounds default value is now set to Half and description is more clear on what it does
- Monkey Madness Optimizations v.1 :
  - "Monkey Madness Double Door Key" is now an Item in the pool, preventing the door opening unless you acquire the Item (Defeating Jake does not open the door anymore)
  - Go Karz electric fence is now always open and Jake grants a check upon defeat ("9-1 Monkey Madness - Defeat Jake")
  - Defeating the Clown in the Circus now gives a check ("9-1 Monkey Madness - Rescue Professor")
  - Nathalie is not a check, but the vanilla behaviors apply and values have been adjusted if you beat Jake before going to the Haunted Mansion.
- Permanent Buttons : Some buttons tied to level progression or significant shortcuts will now always be active once pressed and their corresponding door opened (Even after level revisits):
  - Currently included buttons : 
      - DI Slide room button
      - CrC Water Room button (For the boss door)
      - TvT Lobby Button
      - MM Monkey Head button
      - MM Outside Climb button (For the Painting Unlock)
- Added basic item groups for all gadgets `!hint` aliases : Club, Net, Radar, Slingshot, Sling, Hoop, Punch, Flyer, Car and Water Net (For Progressive Water Net)
- Various Logic changes to account for Lamps and MM Double Door being locked (Also taking into account that Jake door is now always open)

**Fixes:**
- Fixed that getting more keys than PPM unlock requirement (Via cheating them or start_inventory) will make PPM locked permanently
- Fixed Deathlink bug on poles softlocking you
- Fixed some Mailboxes not sending while near a Transition
- Fixed Specter's Factory locations that were also placed in "Bosses" location group by mistake
- Fixed Generation errors on certain conditions

**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.4.9](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.4.9)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.7.0a..v0.7.0c
v0.7.0c.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.7.0c

v0.7.2.description:
## Version 0.7.2

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago

**New content/changes**
- End Credits are now skipped, taking you directly to the Time Hub instead.

**Fixes:**
- Fixed a logic error that would be able to place the Monkey Madness Double Key behind the door it unlocks
- Fixed that after defeating CrC of TvT boss and capturing the last monkey in the level you get kicked out of the level.
- Fixed "2-2 Dark Ruins Mailbox - Out of Place Block (Outside)" not sending in some occasions
- Fixed that you could bypass Level Select restrictions by spamming Right to change worlds
- Fixed Lamps not working in previous patch
- Little optimizations of Punch Replacement code : Using guarded writes alone is fine, we don't need double validation
- Reworked the code of MM Double Door opening, it is now open by changing Visual and Hitboxes values instead of with the standard method.
- Corrected the detection of "Rescue Professor" and "Defeat Jake" locations to be independent of door trigger
- Fixed the behavior of Nathalie's cutscene to be more consistent

**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.4.9](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.4.9)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.7.0c..v0.7.2
v0.7.2.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.7.2

v0.7.3.description:
## Version 0.7.3

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago

**New content/changes**
- [New Option] TrapFillPercentage : Determines the percentage of the remaining filler items that will instead be traps. For now the only trap is "Banana Peel", which makes you slip
- When Lamp Shuffling is off. Lamp doors Items that are added in your start_inventory opens the Lamp Doors without needing to catch monkeys

**Fixes:**

- Fixed location groups being wrong or some locations not being in the right group for hinting
- Lamp Door fixes :
  - Opening of Lamp Doors not working in some cases
  - Room events not triggering correctly when near a Lamp Room (ex.: TV Tower Fan Room)
  - (Hopefully) fixed a crash happening when staying in a Lamp Room for a certain amount of time
- Fixed "2-2 Dark Ruins Mailbox - D-pad Camera Tutorial (Outside)" not sending in some cases
- Fixed "2-2 Dark Ruins Mailbox - Monkeys Lights (Obelisk Inside)" not sending in some cases
- Fixed Specter 1 final credits not being skipped due to oversight in code

**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.5.0](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.5.0)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.7.2..v0.7.3

v0.8.0r2.description:
## Version 0.8.0
Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago.

## Changelog
* **Full logic rewrite!**
  * Logic changed from location based to room based: this will support door shuffle in the future, and will be easier to maintain around new discoveries or certain tricks not belonging on a difficulty.
  * Difficulty setting changed from `glitchless`/`noij`/`ij` to `normal`/`hard`/`expert`, better reflecting what people want to play.
  * Infinite Jump is now its own option to include or exclude, applying to any difficulty.
  * Super Flyer remains an option as it has been.
  * Some events will also show up in the spoiler log now, including any monkeys directly necessary for goal.
* **New goals!**
  * `first` has become `mm` - get to Monkey Madness and defeat Specter!
  * `second` has become `ppm` - catch all the monkeys to get to Peak Point Matrix and defeat Specter!
  * New goal `tokenhunt` - collect enough Specter Token items to win!
  * New goals `mmtoken` and `ppmtoken` - collect enough Specter Token items to unlock access to the final boss, and defeat them to win!
  * In `tokenhunt` and `mmtoken` Specter 2 will be a location accessible with enough keys, set to 1 more than the Monkey Madness entrance.
  * There are a few options around how many Specter Tokens are needed, how many exist, and what locations they can be placed in.
* **Key/Entrance adjustments**
  * These options have been simplified around the Jake race levels, which only have locations with coin shuffle turned on. The races will only be included in entrance shuffle and counted for levels unlocked by keys if coin shuffle is on.
  * Entrance options have been renamed/reduced to just `off`/`on`/`lockmm` to increase clarity. `lockmm` is the same as `on`, but Monkey Madness is forced to be at the final possible entrance.
  * Key options have been reworked to remove race-related options. The existing options have been renamed to `level` and `world` for unlocking 1 level or 1 world at a time. Two new options `none` and `twolevels` have been added, to support no world keys at all, and a setting in between the existing ones.
  * New option "extra keys" allows putting extra world keys into the pool.
* **Other additions/changes**
  * The first mailbox in the Time Station will now show useful information about the seed and your progress. This includes things like logic difficulty, required tricks, what locations and items are shuffled, and how many keys and tokens you have/need.
  * Added "Water Net" as an option for starting gadget.
  * Added `bh_itemdisplay` command to show received items in Bizhawk, and a YAML option to set the default value of this command.
  * Bugfix: Entrances will now show as complete when their level has all monkeys caught, not when the level originally at that entrance has all monkeys caught. Race levels will show as complete after winning them.

## Known bugs
* Stadium Attack and Gladiator Attack will usually play the "entering level" music instead of their intended track.
* With Lamp Shuffle on, some rooms (like the TV Tower tank room or Dexter's Island boulder area) with lamps can crash randomly. It's advised to make a save before entering these rooms to minimize loss of local progress.


**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

Tracker for this apworld version: coming soon?

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.7.3...v0.8.0
v0.8.0r2.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.8.0

v0.8.1.description:
## Version 0.8.1 - The stability update
Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago.

## Changelog
* **Bugfixes**
  * Fixed Monkey Lamp Doors crashing the game under certain conditions (Finally!)
  * Fixed getting kicked out while catching a monkey after having defeated the Boss in CrC, TvT and MM
  * Fixed Banana Peel trap sending you to the Shadow Realm if you got it while Spike is doing his idle animations
  * Fixed Level Select scrolling sometimes allowing you to enter the next level after exiting/completing Races levels
  * Fixed an error while generating with the "local tokens" option in a multiworld
  * Fixed some options description typos
  * Fixed Token Hunt goal not actually goaling

* **Other additions/changes**
  * Added back an Easter egg in Gladiator Attack with the Radar ;)
  * Made the default value for option "Entrance" to "on" (Which means by default levels are randomized)

## Known bugs
* Stadium Attack and Gladiator Attack will usually play the "entering level" music instead of their intended track.
* Beating bosses in boss levels will still kick you out of the level despite the new fix


**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

Tracker for this apworld version: coming soon?

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.8.0...v0.8.1
v0.8.1.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.8.1

v0.8.2.description:
## Version 0.8.2 - Unit tests and cleanup
Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago.

This APworld version is only to standardize world generation and clean a bit of the code.
It will make this world eligible for some Syncs/Asyncs that are more restrictive and ensure nothing breaks generation.

**No changes has been made that impacts gameplay/options**

## Changelog

* **Core**
  * Added base unit tests to the apworld (Required for an official PR)
  * Changed creation of Event Locations from `set_rules` to `create_region` following `test_locations` test
  * Removed hint Group for "Progressive Water Net" being the same as an item and causing conflict ("Water Net")
  * Corrected minor typo in init options

**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

Tracker for this apworld version: coming soon?

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.8.1...v0.8.2
v0.8.2.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.8.2

v0.8.3.description:
## Version 0.8.3 - Side quests and bugfixes
Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago.

## Changelog
* **Options and Commands!**
  * Options :
    * [New] Kickout Prevention : Change if it should or not kick you out of the levels when catching the last monkey in the level. Also prevents you being kicked out of bosses after defeating them
    * [New] Auto Equip : If on, Automatically equip received gadgets in an available face button
  * Commands : To fit with the new options and to also change existing behavior
    * [Changed] /bh_itemdisplay ["","off","on"] : Show status or Enable/Disable Bizhawk Item Display, Now persistent ! (See "Other additions/changes" section bellow)
    * [New] /prevent_kickout ["","off","on"] : Show status or Enable/Disable Kickout Prevention option
    * [New] /deathlink ["","off","on"] : Show status or Enable/Disable Deathlink option
    * [New] /auto_equip ["","off","on"] : Show status or Enable/Disable the Auto Equip option

* **Bugfixes**
  * Fixed? DI and TVT Monkey Lamps crashing the game in certain cases.
  * Fixed Permanent Buttons variables being overwritten constantly, causing some weird behaviors
  * Fixed Kickout Prevention being broken in some (if not all) cases.
  * Fixed? Item desync by not allowing receiving items in "Demo" and "Save/Load" states
  * Fixed Bosses still kicking you out even if Kickout Prevention is on (Cinematics will still play)
  * Fixed Mach3 logic
  
* **Other additions/changes**
  * Changes to options with the Bizhawk client commands will persist thought connections.
  If an option has not changed, it will take slot_data values.
  When it is changed at least once, it will save the value and reuse it in subsequent connections.
  * Added tracking of room number to be able to track it in Poptracker pack eventually
  * Added event tracking to see if you pushed the Dark Ruins Block (Also for the tracker)
  
## Known bugs
* Stadium Attack and Gladiator Attack will sometime play the "entering level" music instead of their intended track. (And level music will be bugged) To correct this simply hit "Retry"


**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.6.0](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.6.0)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.8.2...v0.8.3
v0.8.3.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.8.3

v0.8.4.description:
## Version 0.8.4 - Imports causing Linux Crash

**If you do not have Linux, you can skip this update**

Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago.

## Changelog
* Removed unused imports that caused the apworld to not work properly on Linux

**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.8.3...v0.8.4
v0.8.4.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.8.4

v0.8.5.description:
## Version 0.8.5 - Another bugfixes/stability update!
Please read the [setup guide](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago.

## Changelog

* **Commands**
  * [New] Implemented `/syncprogress` command : This command will check the multiworld's state and update all checked monkey locations to the "Caught" status. Will also update locations obtained thought another's world "Collect".
  
* **Bugfixes**
  * Fixed MM Carlito not requiring Net in all logic difficulties [@jeffreybardon]
  * Fixed MM Monkey Head Coin requiring Net in all logic difficulties [@jeffreybardon]
  * Fixed MM Clown not spawning under certain conditions.
  * Fixed Lamps/Water net not being synched sometimes
  * Fixed Red Mailboxes not sending if they were already open. Now checks the state of the mailbox when you are in the mailbox's room and resend it if needed.

* **Logic changes**
  * TVT Water Basement Coin : Changed Hard/Expert rule to not require anything (You still need to be able to reach the Water Basement Room as usual) [@jeffreybardon]
  
* **Other additions/changes**
  * Implemented Universal Tracker - Entrance Shuffle combability : Entrance shuffle is now compatible with Universal Tracker and will now show the correct available locations depending of the random entrance order.
  * Client will now revalidate the monkey count when exiting a level to ensure it is accurate with which monkeys are caught. This is mainly to prevent being locked of PPM while having to get all the monkeys.
  * Rewrite of the Game page for a better understanding of what items, options and modifications the Archipelago Ape Escape implementation have and how it affects gameplay [@jeffreybardon]
  * French Setup documentation now available !

## Known bugs
* Stadium Attack and Gladiator Attack will sometime play the "entering level" music instead of their intended track. (And level music will be bugged) To correct this simply hit "Retry"


**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.6.0](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.6.0)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.8.4...v0.8.5
v0.8.5.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.8.5

## Changelog
* **Options**

* **Commands**

* **Bugfixes**
  * Fixed MM BG being collected by the command `/syncprogress` to prevent softlocks
  * Fixed Deathlink messages taking `random()` instead of `random.random()` and crashing the client

## Known bugs
* Stadium Attack and Gladiator Attack will sometime play the "entering level" music instead of their intended track. (And level music will be bugged) To correct this simply hit "Retry"


**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

v0.8.8.description:
## Version 0.8.8 - New Items, bugfixes and changes!
Please read the setup guides for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago :
[English](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) / [French](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_fr.md) 

## Changelog

* **Items**
  * [New] Monkey Mash (Trap) : When received, the trap sends random inputs for 15 seconds. Can be extended to a maximum of 45 seconds if you receive another while the trap is already active
  * [New] Rainbow Cookie (Usefull) : When received, will give you a sick looking aura and prevent any Cookie loss during 10 seconds. Can be extended to a maximum of 30 seconds if you receive another one while it is active.
  * [Change] Single Explosive/Guided Pellet are now classified as "Filler" instead of "Useful" (@jeffreybardon)
* **Options**
  * [Change] Bizhawk Item Display now displays what Item you send to which player in addition to what you receive. Also shows the Item classification (Progressive,Usefull, etc.). Due to a changed display method, the items will not now show on reconnect

* **Bugfixes**
  * Fixed transpositions of doors in Thick Jungle Boulder Room (@jeffreybardon)
  * Fixed having Kickout prevention set to "Off" warping you to the Races after finishing CR or HS
  * Fixed a bug with the Level Select that always showed GA as not completed if SA was also not completed, even when GA was completed
  * Fixed color options not being accurate with the colors available in-game
 
* **Mics**
  * Corrected Deathlink command disabled text
  * Update to the English documentation (@jeffreybardon)
  * Update to the French documentation
  * Small syntax, grammar corrections and code cleanup (@jeffreybardon)

## Known bugs
* Stadium Attack and Gladiator Attack will sometime play the "entering level" music instead of their intended track. (And level music will be bugged) To correct this simply hit "Retry"

**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\*
(Or use the one in this release)**

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.6.1](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.6.1)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.8.7...v0.8.8
v0.8.8.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.8.8

v0.9.0a.description:
## Version 0.9.0a - ~~Random Starting Room~~ Lots of fixes and cool features!
Please read the setup guides for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago :
[English](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) / [French](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_fr.md) 

## Changelog

* **Options**
  - [Changed] Spike Color : Now using RGB values closer to real Color Hex values
  - [Changed] Entrance Shuffle : Add Peak Point Matrix to entrance shuffle when it is not postgame or the goal level  
  - [New] TrapsOnReconnect -> Determine which traps are sent when reconnecting.
  - [New] CustomFillerWeights and TrapWeights -> Specify the weighted chance of rolling individual trap/filler items.
  - ~~[New] Randomize Starting Room -> Randomizes the starting room for each level (Within the same level)~~ Disabled for now, any value set in the YAML will be ignored and replaced by "Off" when generating. Too many issues with this
* **Items**
  - New Trap : Icy Hot Pants -> Launch Spike in the air as if he touched Lava or Frozen Water
* **Universal Tracker**
  - Enabled YAML-less option
  - Implemented "Out of Logic" checks (Yellow)
  - Compatible with the new Randomize Starting Room option
* **Client**
  - BH ItemDisplay now correctly show double classification items
  - Fixed Coral Cave Iz and Lux local addresses being inverted
* **Logic**
  - Fix transposition of Wabi Sabi Wall last room monkeys
  - Corrected TVT Manic Hard+ rule
  - Fix two minor logic bugs (Kalama and Schafette)
  - Add missing connection in Dark Ruins
  - Corrected wrong entrance for 2-3 Cryptic Relics Mailbox - Back Camera Tutorial (Main Ruins)
  - Require swimming for TJ Entry coin for Hoop route on expert
  - Fixed Super Flyer access rules being ignored in most cases
  - Fixed transposition of access rules for Thick Jungle Entry Room
  - Add missed method of access to Thick Jungle Entry->Boulder

## Known bugs
* Stadium Attack and Gladiator Attack will sometime play the "entering level" music instead of their intended track. (And level music will be bugged) To correct this simply hit "Retry"

**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\***

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.6.2](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.6.2)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.9.0....v0.9.0a
v0.9.0a.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.9.0a

v0.9.1.description:
## Version 0.9.1 - Random Starting Room + Faster client!
Please read the setup guides for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago :
[English](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) / [French](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_fr.md) 

## Changelog

* **Options**
  - [New] Randomize Starting Room : Randomizes the starting room for each level (Within the same level)  
  - [New] Trap Link : Whether your received traps are linked to other players (If their "weight" is not set to 0)
* **Items**
  - [New] Stun Trap : A trap that stuns spike for about 2 seconds, preventing all movement and gadget uses.
  - [New] Gadget Shuffle Trap: This trap shuffles your face button gadgets, replacing them with a random selection from all your unlocked gadgets.
* **Optimizations/Fixes**
  - Lamp Doors, Doors and Permanent Buttons are now guarded writes for better consistency and open all at once, instead of by segments
  - Improved connection to the client by reducing the number of reads
  (Clients is now WAY more responsive, especially for Mailboxes checks)
  - PPM is now locked as the last level when the goal is `mm`, `ppm` or `ppmtoken` (@jeffreybardon)
* **Misc**
  - Added ending message in Bizhawk for timed items
  - Added RandomStartingRoom info in the Time Station mailbox
  - Reworked RAMAddresses.py for better sanity when coding
  - Received items will now only write to memory when there is an actual change
## Known bugs
* Stadium Attack and Gladiator Attack will sometime play the "entering level" music instead of their intended track. (And level music will be bugged) To correct this simply hit "Retry"

**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\***

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.6.2](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.6.2)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.9.0a....v0.9.1
v0.9.1.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.9.1

v0.9.2.description:
## Version 0.9.2 - Traps reworks and other fixes!
Please read the setup guides for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago :
[English](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) / [French](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_fr.md) 

## Changelog

* **Traps**
  - TrapLink traps are now priority traps with a 5 second expiration
  - Fixed TrapLink trying to send ALL items instead of just trap items
  - Made "TrapsOnReconnect" opt-in (Empty list by default)
  - Reduced Monkey Mash Trap duration to 10s and set the input frequency to 1 second
  - Prevented Traps activation in Spike's catching animation
  - Fixed Stun Trap in 2 ways : Locked Camera following and limited certain traps activation when Stun Trap is active
  - [New] Camera Rotate Trap -> Tilts the camera at a 45 degree angle for 20 seconds
* **Randomize Starting Room**  
  - Fixed softlocks happening during the transitions
  - Fixed a bug in Monkey Madness with RSR where it would make the audio silent or weird after the initial warp.
  - Fixed not being able to activate Super Flyer properly when RSR spawns you in a non-vanilla spawn room.
* **Client and logic fixes**   
  - Fixed Client not working when disconnecting/reconnecting without closing it
  - Fixed PPM not being recognized as completed correctly in Level Select(again)
  - Fixed Lobby AP info mailbox crashing the client when staying in it for too long
  - Fixed Cryptic Relics, Snowy Mammoth and Frosty Retreat not setting the right monkey count after exiting level
  - Fixed Coral Cave Second Room to First Room rule to require Dive instead of Swim
  - Monkey Madness BG is now included in the /syncprogress command. When BG is already caught, simply going back in the "Alert room" will push the button for you, enabling the UFOS.

## Known bugs
* Stadium Attack and Gladiator Attack will sometime play the "entering level" music instead of their intended track.


**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\***

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.6.2](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.6.2)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.9.1....v0.9.2
v0.9.2.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.9.2

v0.9.3.description:
## Version 0.9.3 - New options and QOL!
Please read the setup guides for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago :
[English](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) / [French](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_fr.md) 

## Changelog

* **Options/Commands**
  - FastGoalOption : If this is enabled and the chosen Goal is `mmtoken` or `ppmtoken`, provides easy access to the end boss once enough tokens have been obtained.
         The warp will be available in the Training Room where the first training warp would be (Water Net).
         NOTE : Music does not change when warping. Using the warp will result in fighting the final boss with the Time Station music.
  - AllowCollectOption : Allows for !collect to catch Monkeys or collect Coins containing items for other players.
  - `/syncprogress` command overhauled: Now works like a one-time execution of the allowcollect feature, immediately syncing monkeys/coins.

* **Traps**
  - Better movement locking behavior for the Stun Trap
* **Randomize Starting Room**  
  - Random Starting Room transitions are now more stable. Delayed the steps/triggers a bit to let time for the client to initiate the warp correctly.
  - In case of emergency, you will now be able to exit the level and retry the transition (Should not happen, but just in case)
* **Client and logic fixes**   
  - Level Select now shows if you collected all coins in a given level or race (Also works when Entrance Shuffle is on)
  - Code improvements for various things/faster client : Changed Datastorage behavior, more efficient locations sending, altered the way customcommands are managed...
  - Fixed LocationGroup for Monkey Madness Monkeys
  - Fixed an error when Bizhawk client would lose some or all options values on reconnecting after a disconnection


## Known bugs
* Stadium Attack and Gladiator Attack will sometime play the "entering level" music instead of their intended track.


**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\***

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.6.2](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.6.2)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.9.2....v0.9.3
v0.9.3.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.9.3

v0.9.4.description:
## Version 0.9.4 - Hotfix for 0.9.3!

**This update is backwards compatible with 0.9.3 and is an hotfix for it**
**If you generated with 0.9.3 it is recommended to upgrade to this one**

Please read the setup guides for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago :
[English](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) / [French](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_fr.md) 

## Changelog

* **Fixes**
  - Fixed allowcollect error when exiting a level
  - Fixed FastTokenGoal not enabling the warp correctly when above the token requirement
  - Fixed Monkey Madness and PPM bosses not sending correctly
  - Fixed Monkeys occasionally being sent based on previous when switching rooms


## Known bugs
* Stadium Attack and Gladiator Attack will sometime play the "entering level" music instead of their intended track.


**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\***

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.6.2](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.6.2)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.9.3....v0.9.4
v0.9.4.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.9.4

v0.9.5.description:
## Version 0.9.5 - True Random Start Room and more fixes!
Please read the setup guides for information on how to setup this game for Archipelago :
[English](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_en.md) / [French](https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/blob/apeescape/worlds/apeescape/docs/setup_fr.md) 

## Changelog

* **Client and logic fixes**   
  - Random Starting Room behavior changes : Now warps you to the correct room, no more strange warps/transitions needed. Also corrected the Softlock bug many reported since it does not use that system anymore. 
  (Yes, you can even fastforward throught everything and it will still work)
  - Fixed MM not having all coins registered when `allowcollect` triggered (Or /syncprogress)
  - Fixed going into a transition incrementing the monkey count and causing some monkeys to get caught by error.
  - Fixed Victory condition not sending while entering the FastTokenGoal warp

* **Universal Tracker**
  - Made "Victory" Item an event item, making the "Go Mode" tracker in UT able to detect when you can reach your goal.
  - [Info] UT support state : Full Logic support with Entrance Randomization, Random Starting Room, SuperFlyer, IJ and Glitched/OOL checks

## Known bugs
* Stadium Attack and Gladiator Attack will sometime play the "entering level" music instead of their intended track.


**\*Don't forget to do "Generate Template Options" after installing the ``apworld`` if you want the new options in the YAML\***

Tracker for this apworld version : [Ape Escape Tracker 0.6.2](https://github.com/lurch9229/Ape-Escape-Tracker/releases/tag/0.6.2)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Thedragon005/Archipelago-Ape-Escape/compare/v0.9.4....v0.9.5
v0.9.5.title: Ape Escape apworld v0.9.5
